resources.string: Enter the name of the network of the GreenCube
Enter the address of the FTP server
Enter the password of the network of the server
Choose the parameters of the automatic transfer
Activate or desactivate transfer by LTE

string-array.name: NomSettingWifi
string-array.item: Transfer data automaticly at all time. Data charges may apply
Transfer data automaticly when logged to WiFI only

string-array.name: ValeurSettingWifi
string-array.item: Transfer data automaticly at all time. Data charges may apply
Transfer data automaticly when logged to WiFI only

string-array.name: AutoriserLTE
string-array.item: Do not allow transfer by LTE

string-array.name: ValeurAutoriserLTE
string-array.item: Do not allow transfer by LTE
